title: Dear Sir
description: Even as he puts pen to paper, Scott knows it'll take all his courage to post his latest note to Joe. His lover wants him to write down exactly what he needs in order to feel safe and confident in their relationship. Yet for Scott, even though it's the hardest letter he has ever written, he follows Joe's command.When it comes to Joe, waiting patiently isn't his strongest virtue, but he promised to give Scott all the time he needs in which to write his letter, and he's going to keep that promise.And both men realize, once the letter has been sent, then received, just about anything can happen...
author: Kim Dare
